TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlDsigExcC14NTransform extends System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform

summary.span: 表示由万维网联合会 (W3C) 定义的数字签名的专用 C14N XML 规范化转换（不带注释）。

span.span: Represents the exclusive C14N XML canonicalization transform for a digital signature as defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C), without comments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示无注释的独占 C14N XML 规范化转换。The class represents the exclusive C14N XML canonicalization transform without comments. 此类与类相似, 后者允许签名者使用 XML 文档的规范形式创建摘要。This class is similar to the class, which allows a signer to create a digest using the canonical form of an XML document. 但是, 类会排除规范化子文档中的上级上下文。However, the class excludes ancestor context from a canonicalized subdocument. 需要规范化 xml 子文档, 使其独立于其 xml 上下文时, 可使用类。Use the class when you need to canonicalize an XML subdocument so that it is independent from its XML context. 例如, 在复杂的通信协议内使用已签名 XML 的应用程序 (如 Web 服务) 通常需要以这种方式规范化 XML。For example, applications such as Web services that use signed XML within complex communication protocols often need to canonicalize XML in this manner. 此类应用程序通常在各种动态构造的元素内信封 XML, 这可能会显著更改文档并导致 XML 签名验证失败。Such applications often envelop XML within various dynamically constructed elements, which can substantially change the document and cause XML signature verification to fail. 类通过从规范子文档中排除此类上级上下文来解决此问题。The class solves this problem by excluding such ancestor context from the canonical subdocument. 通常, 不会创建规范化转换类的新实例。Typically, you do not create a new instance of a canonicalization transform class. 若要指定规范化转换, 请将描述转换的统一资源标识符 (URI) 传递给属性, 该属性可从属性访问。To specify a canonicalization transform, pass the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes a transform to the property, which is accessible from the property. 若要获取对规范化转换的引用, 请使用属性, 该属性可从属性进行访问。To acquire a reference to the canonicalization transform, use the property, which is accessible from the property. 仅当要手动对 XML 文档进行哈希处理或使用自己的规范化算法时, 才需要创建规范化转换类的新实例。You are required to create a new instance of a canonicalization transform class only when you want to manually hash an XML document or use your own canonicalization algorithm. 描述类的 URI 由字段定义。The URI that describes the class is defined by the field. 描述类的 URI 由字段定义。The URI that describes the class is defined by the field. 有关独占 C14N 转换的详细信息, 请参阅 W3C [XMLDSIG 规范](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/)。For more information about the exclusive C14N transform, see the W3C [XMLDSIG specification](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/). 规范化算法是在 W3C[规范 XML 规范](https://www.w3.org/2001/10/xml-exc-c14n)中定义的。The canonicalization algorithm is defined in the W3C [Canonical XML specification](https://www.w3.org/2001/10/xml-exc-c14n). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用信封签名通过类对 XML 文档进行签名。The following code example shows how to sign an XML document with the class using an envelope signature. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.XML.XmlDsigExcC14NTransform#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XmlDsigExcC14NTransform/CPP/example.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.XmlDsigExcC14NTransform#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XmlDsigExcC14NTransform/CS/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.XmlDsigExcC14NTransform#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XmlDsigExcC14NTransform/VB/example.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string inclusiveNamespacesPrefixList) cil managed

param.name: inclusiveNamespacesPrefixList
param.span: 要使用标准规范化算法来规范化的命名空间前缀。

span.span: The namespace prefixes to canonicalize using the standard canonicalization algorithm.

summary.span: 初始化 类的一个新实例，并指定要使用标准规范化算法来规范化的命名空间前缀列表。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class specifying a list of namespace prefixes to canonicalize using the standard canonicalization algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `inclusiveNamespacesPrefixList`参数包含以空白分隔的命名空间前缀列表, 以使用标准规范化算法而不是专用规范化算法来规范化。The `inclusiveNamespacesPrefixList` parameter contains a white-space delimited list of namespace prefixes to canonicalize using the standard canonicalization algorithm rather than the exclusive canonicalization algorithm. 若要指定没有前缀的默认命名空间, 请传递特殊前缀 "#default"。To specify the default namespace, which does not have a prefix, pass the special prefix "#default".

remarks.format: ## Remarks `inclusiveNamespacesPrefixList`参数包含以空白分隔的命名空间前缀列表, 以使用标准规范化算法而不是专用规范化算法来规范化。The `inclusiveNamespacesPrefixList` parameter contains a white-space delimited list of namespace prefixes to canonicalize using the standard canonicalization algorithm rather than the exclusive canonicalization algorithm. 若要指定没有前缀的默认命名空间, 请传递特殊前缀 "#default"。To specify the default namespace, which does not have a prefix, pass the special prefix "#default".

span.span: A list of the XML nodes that represent the transform-specific content needed to describe the current object in an XMLDSIG element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法在对以前通过调用方法设置的值运行当前转换后, 返回当前转换的输出。 The method returns the output of the current transform after it is run on the value previously set by a call to the method. 返回的对象的类型必须是属性中的类型对象之一。The type of the returned object must be one of the type objects in the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含以空白分隔的命名空间前缀列表, 以使用标准规范化算法而不是专用规范化算法来规范化。The property contains a white-space delimited list of namespace prefixes to canonicalize using the standard canonicalization algorithm rather than the exclusive canonicalization algorithm. 若要指定没有前缀的默认命名空间, 请传递特殊前缀 "#default"。To specify the default namespace, which does not have a prefix, pass the special prefix "#default". ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用信封签名通过类对 XML 文档进行签名。The following code example shows how to sign an XML document with the class using an envelope signature. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.XML.XmlDsigExcC14NTransform#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XmlDsigExcC14NTransform/CPP/example.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.XmlDsigExcC14NTransform#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XmlDsigExcC14NTransform/CS/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.XmlDsigExcC14NTransform#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XmlDsigExcC14NTransform/VB/example.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取一个类型数组，这些类型是当前 对象的 方法的有效输入。

span.span: Gets an array of types that are valid inputs to the method of the current object.

value.span: 当前 对象的一个有效输入类型数组；只能将属于这些类型之一的对象传递给当前 对象的 方法。

span.span: An array of valid input types for the current object; you can pass only objects of one of these types to the method of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回的数组必须至少包含一个元素, 因为每个对象都必须接受至少一种类型作为有效输入。The array returned by the property must contain at least one element because every object must accept at least one type as valid input. 对象通常接受以下一个或多个类型作为输入: 、 或。 A object typically accepts one or more of the following types as input: , , or .

summary.span: 获取一个类型数组，这些类型是当前 对象的 方法的可能输出。

span.span: Gets an array of types that are possible outputs from the methods of the current object.

value.span: 当前 对象的一个有效输出类型数组；当前 对象的 方法只返回属于这些类型之一的对象。

span.span: An array of valid output types for the current object; the methods of the current object return only objects of one of these types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回的数组必须包含至少一个元素, 因为每个转换必须生成至少一个类型作为输出。The array returned by the property must contain at least one element because every transform must generate at least one type as output.
